name: verifyPlaceOrderModalNotDisplayedForEmptyCart
description: Verify that clicking 'Place Order' shows an error when the cart is empty.
descriptionHtml: Verify that clicking 'Place Order' shows an error when the cart is empty.
statusMessage: Place Order modal should not be displayed for an empty cart. expected [true] but found [false]
